variables.input: üü¢ Up-to-date,üü° Updatable,üü† Obsolete,üî¥ Vulnerable,‚ö™ Undocumented,‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent

fetch dt.entity.host, from: -15m
| fieldsAdd osVersion, managementZones, tags
| filter isNotNull(osVersion) AND (in($MZ, managementZones) OR $MZ == "Any") AND (in($Tag, tags) OR $Tag == "Any")
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter dt.system.bucket == "default_davis_custom_events"
  | filter event.name == "software-obsolescence-management.os-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC
  ],
  sourceField:osVersion,
  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| fields event.os
| dedup event.os
| fields os = if(isNull(event.os), "null", else: event.os)

fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from: -15m
| fieldsAdd softwareTechnologies, managementZones, tags
| filter (in($MZ, managementZones) OR $MZ == "Any") AND (in($Tag, tags) OR $Tag == "Any")
| expand softwareTechnologies
| parse softwareTechnologies, "'type:' LD:Technology ',edition:' LD"
| filter Technology != "DYNATRACE"
| fields Technology
| dedup Technology

data record(Library = "Any (more scalable than *)")
| append [fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from: -15m
| expand softwareComponentId = asRecord(contains)[`dt.entity.software_component`] // This relationship retrieves a maximum 100 entities
| dedup softwareComponentId
| lookup [
  fetch dt.entity.software_component, from: -15m
  | fields entity.name, id, softwareComponentType
],
  sourceField:softwareComponentId,
  lookupField:id,
  executionOrder: leftFirst
| filter in(lookup.softwareComponentType, $Technologies)
| fieldsAdd lastColonIndex = lastIndexOf(lookup.entity.name, ":")
| fields Library = substring(lookup.entity.name, to:lastColonIndex)
| dedup Library
| limit 100000
]

120.content:
#
#### üíø Stay Ahead Of Your Software Portfolio üíø

124.title: OS Version Distribution
124.query:
fetch dt.entity.host, from: -15m
| fieldsAdd osVersion, managementZones, hostGroupName, tags, softwareObsolescenceManagement = entity.name
| filter isNotNull(osVersion) AND (in($MZ, managementZones) OR $MZ == "Any") AND (in($Tag, tags) OR $Tag == "Any") AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage)
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter dt.system.bucket == "default_davis_custom_events"
  | filter event.name == "software-obsolescence-management.os-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC
  ],
  sourceField:osVersion,
  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| fieldsAdd stringifiedOs = if(isNull(event.os), "null", else: event.os)
| filter in(stringifiedOs, $OperatingSystems)
| fieldsAdd `Extended Support` = if(
  ((indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), osVersion, from: 0) >= 0) AND (indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), "}", from: indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), osVersion, from: 0)) >= 0)),
  substring(
      toString(array($SupportOverrides)),
      from: (
        (indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), osVersion, from: 0) +
        stringLength(osVersion) +
        5)
      ),
      to: (indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), "}", from: indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), osVersion, from: 0)) - 2)
    ),
    else: null
)
| fieldsAdd age = now() - toTimestamp(event.currentCyclePublishedAt)
| fieldsAdd timeBeforeObsolescence = toTimestamp(if(isNotNull(`Extended Support`), `Extended Support`, else: event.eol)) - now()
| fieldsAdd Status = if(timeBeforeObsolescence < toDuration(0), "üü† Obsolete")
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND event.currentVersion == event.latestVersion, "üü¢ Up-to-date", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(timeBeforeObsolescence), "üü° Updatable", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status), "‚ö™ Undocumented", else: Status)
| filter in(Status, $Status)
| fields Status, Host = entity.name, `Host Group` = hostGroupName, `Management Zones` = managementZones, `Tags` = tags, OS = event.os, `Running Version` = event.currentVersion, `Full Name` = osVersion, LTS = event.lts, Cycle = event.currentCycle, `Cycle Published At` = substring(event.currentCyclePublishedAt, to:10), `End of Life` = event.eol, `Extended Support`, `Max Age` = age, `Time Before Obsolescence` = timeBeforeObsolescence, `Latest Version` = event.latestVersion, `Published at` = substring(event.latestVersionPublishedAt, to:10), Link = event.link, id
| append [ // VMWare
  //from classic integration
  fetch dt.entity.virtualmachine, from: -15m
  | filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host], ipAddress, cloudTags=tags, datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.vmware_datacenter]
  //match with OneAgent hosts
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.vmware_datacenter], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"),
    tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
  //add extension VMs
  | append [ fetch `dt.entity.vmware:virtualmachine`
    | filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
    | fieldsAdd host=arrayFirst(same_as[dt.entity.host]), ipAddress=vm_ip_address, cloudTags=array()
    | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsadd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host." //match with OneAgent hosts
    | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
    | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
      ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags)]
  //add OneAgent VMware hosts
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND hypervisorType == "VMWARE" AND isNull(runs_on[dt.entity.virtualmachine])
    | fieldsAdd datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.geoloc_site]
    | lookup [fetch dt.entity.geoloc_site], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
    | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA", tags, datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId]
  | dedup id
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown VMWare VM OS", id
]
| append [ // AWS
  fetch dt.entity.ec2_instance, from: -15m
  | filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host], ipAddress=arrayConcat(if(isNotNull(localIp), array(localIp), else: array()), if(isNotNull(publicIp), array(publicIp), else: array())),
    cloudMonitored=isNotNull(accessible_by[dt.entity.aws_credentials]), cloudTags=tags, datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.aws_availability_zone]
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.aws_availability_zone], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fieldsAdd oneAgentMonitored=not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(oneAgentMonitored AND cloudMonitored,"FULL", else:if(oneAgentMonitored, "OA", else:"CLOUD")),
    tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown AWS VM OS", id
]
| append [ // GCP
  fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:gce_instance`, from: -15m
  | filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host][0], cloudTags=tags, zone
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], lookupField: id, sourceField:host, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"),
    tags=arrayConcat(cloudTags,host.tags), datacenter=zone
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND cloudType == "GOOGLE_CLOUD_PLATFORM" AND isNull(runs_on[`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:gce_instance`])
    | fieldsAdd datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.gcp_zone]
    | lookup [fetch dt.entity.gcp_zone], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
    | fields id, entity.name, ipAddress, monitoringStatus="OA", tags, datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown GCP VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Azure
  fetch dt.entity.azure_vm, from: -15m
  | filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host], ipAddress, cloudMonitored=isNotNull(accessible_by[dt.entity.azure_subscription]),
    cloudTags=tags, datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.azure_region]
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.azure_region], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fieldsAdd oneAgentMonitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(oneAgentMonitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(oneAgentMonitored AND cloudMonitored, "FULL", else: if(oneAgentMonitored, "OA", else: "CLOUD")),
    tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Azure VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Hyper-V
  fetch `dt.entity.hyperv:virtual_machine`, from: -15m
  | filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
  | fieldsAdd host=same_as[dt.entity.host][0], ip_address, cloudTags=tags
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ip_address), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags)
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND hypervisorType == "HYPER_V" AND cloudType != "AZURE" AND isNull(same_as[`dt.entity.hyperv:virtual_machine`])
    | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA", tags]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Hyper-V VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Nutanix
  fetch `dt.entity.nutanix:vm`, from: -15m
  | filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
  | fieldsAdd host=same_as[dt.entity.host][0], IpAddress, cloudTags=tags
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:IpAddress), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags)
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND hypervisorType == "AHV" AND isNull(same_as[`dt.entity.nutanix:vm`])
    | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA", tags]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Nutanix VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Oracle
  fetch `dt.entity.cloud:oci:compute`, from: -15m
  | filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host][0], cloudTags=tags
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], lookupField: id, sourceField:host, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(cloudTags,host.tags)
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND cloudType == "ORACLE" AND isNull(runs_on[`dt.entity.cloud:oci:compute`])
    | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA",tags]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Oracle VM OS", id
]
| summarize by:{Status, `Full Name`, `Time Before Obsolescence`}, count = count()
| fields Status, `Host Count` = count, `Time Before Obsolescence`, `Full Name`
| sort `Time Before Obsolescence` ASC, `Host Count` DESC

125.title: Operating Systems
125.query:
fetch dt.entity.host, from: -15m
| fieldsAdd osVersion, managementZones, hostGroupName, tags, softwareObsolescenceManagement = entity.name
| filter isNotNull(osVersion) AND (in($MZ, managementZones) OR $MZ == "Any") AND (in($Tag, tags) OR $Tag == "Any") AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage)
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter dt.system.bucket == "default_davis_custom_events"
  | filter event.name == "software-obsolescence-management.os-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC
  ],
  sourceField:osVersion,
  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| fieldsAdd stringifiedOs = if(isNull(event.os), "null", else: event.os)
| filter in(stringifiedOs, $OperatingSystems)
| fieldsAdd `Extended Support` = if(
  ((indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), osVersion, from: 0) >= 0) AND (indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), "}", from: indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), osVersion, from: 0)) >= 0)),
  substring(
      toString(array($SupportOverrides)),
      from: (
        (indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), osVersion, from: 0) +
        stringLength(osVersion) +
        5)
      ),
      to: (indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), "}", from: indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), osVersion, from: 0)) - 2)
    ),
    else: null
)
| fieldsAdd age = now() - toTimestamp(event.currentCyclePublishedAt)
| fieldsAdd timeBeforeObsolescence = toTimestamp(if(isNotNull(`Extended Support`), `Extended Support`, else: event.eol)) - now()
| fieldsAdd Status = if(timeBeforeObsolescence < toDuration(0), "üü† Obsolete")
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND event.currentVersion == event.latestVersion, "üü¢ Up-to-date", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(timeBeforeObsolescence), "üü° Updatable", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status), "‚ö™ Undocumented", else: Status)
| filter in(Status, $Status)
| fields Status, Host = entity.name, `Host Group` = hostGroupName, `Management Zones` = managementZones, `Tags` = tags, OS = event.os, `Running Version` = event.currentVersion, `Full Name` = osVersion, LTS = event.lts, Cycle = event.currentCycle, `Cycle Published At` = substring(event.currentCyclePublishedAt, to:10), `End of Life` = event.eol, `Max Age` = age, `Time Before Obsolescence` = timeBeforeObsolescence, `Latest Version` = event.latestVersion, `Published at` = substring(event.latestVersionPublishedAt, to:10), Link = event.link, id
| filter isNotNull(OS)
| summarize countDistinct(OS)

129.title: Hosts with Up-To-Date OS Version
129.query:
fetch dt.entity.host, from: -15m
| fieldsAdd osVersion, managementZones, hostGroupName, tags, softwareObsolescenceManagement = entity.name
| filter in("üü¢ Up-to-date", $Status) AND isNotNull(osVersion) AND (in($MZ, managementZones) OR $MZ == "Any") AND (in($Tag, tags) OR $Tag == "Any") AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage)
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter dt.system.bucket == "default_davis_custom_events"
  | filter event.name == "software-obsolescence-management.os-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC
  ],
  sourceField:osVersion,
  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| fieldsAdd stringifiedOs = if(isNull(event.os), "null", else: event.os)
| filter in(stringifiedOs, $OperatingSystems)
| fieldsAdd `Extended Support` = if(
  ((indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), osVersion, from: 0) >= 0) AND (indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), "}", from: indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), osVersion, from: 0)) >= 0)),
  substring(
      toString(array($SupportOverrides)),
      from: (
        (indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), osVersion, from: 0) +
        stringLength(osVersion) +
        5)
      ),
      to: (indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), "}", from: indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), osVersion, from: 0)) - 2)
    ),
    else: null
)
| fieldsAdd age = now() - toTimestamp(event.currentCyclePublishedAt)
| fieldsAdd timeBeforeObsolescence = toTimestamp(if(isNotNull(`Extended Support`), `Extended Support`, else: event.eol)) - now()
| fieldsAdd Status = if(timeBeforeObsolescence < toDuration(0), "üü† Obsolete")
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND event.currentVersion == event.latestVersion, "üü¢ Up-to-date", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(timeBeforeObsolescence), "üü° Updatable", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status), "‚ö™ Undocumented", else: Status)
| filter in(Status, "üü¢ Up-to-date")
| summarize count = count()
| fields concat(count, "üü¢")

132.title: Hosts missing OneAgent
132.query:
// VMWare
//from classic integration
fetch dt.entity.virtualmachine, from: -15m
| filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
| fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host], ipAddress, cloudTags=tags, datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.vmware_datacenter], softwareObsolescenceManagement = entity.name
//match with OneAgent hosts
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
| fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.vmware_datacenter], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
| fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
  ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"),
  tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
//add extension VMs
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.vmware:virtualmachine`
  | filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
  | fieldsAdd host=arrayFirst(same_as[dt.entity.host]), ipAddress=vm_ip_address, cloudTags=array()
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsadd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host." //match with OneAgent hosts
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags)]
//add OneAgent VMware hosts
| append [ fetch dt.entity.host
  | filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
  | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND hypervisorType == "VMWARE" AND isNull(runs_on[dt.entity.virtualmachine])
  | fieldsAdd datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.geoloc_site]
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.geoloc_site], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA", tags, datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId]
| dedup id
| filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
| fields Status = "‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown VMWare VM OS", id
| append [ // AWS
  fetch dt.entity.ec2_instance, from: -15m
  | filter in("‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", $Status) AND $MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any" AND in("Operating Systems", $Coverage) AND in("null", $OperatingSystems)
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host], ipAddress=arrayConcat(if(isNotNull(localIp), array(localIp), else: array()), if(isNotNull(publicIp), array(publicIp), else: array())),
    cloudMonitored=isNotNull(accessible_by[dt.entity.aws_credentials]), cloudTags=tags, datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.aws_availability_zone]
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.aws_availability_zone], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fieldsAdd oneAgentMonitored=not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(oneAgentMonitored AND cloudMonitored,"FULL", else:if(oneAgentMonitored, "OA", else:"CLOUD")),
    tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "‚ö†Ô∏è Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown AWS VM OS", id
]
| append [ // GCP

  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host][0], cloudTags=tags, zone

  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"),
    tags=arrayConcat(cloudTags,host.tags), datacenter=zone
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND cloudType == "GOOGLE_CLOUD_PLATFORM" AND isNull(runs_on[`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:gce_instance`])
    | fieldsAdd datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.gcp_zone]

    | fields id, entity.name, ipAddress, monitoringStatus="OA", tags, datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")

    tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId

136.title: Obsolete Technology Instances
136.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from: -15m
| fieldsAdd Process = entity.name, softwareTechnologies, managementZones, tags, softwareObsolescenceManagement = entity.name
| filter in("üü† Obsolete", $Status) AND (in($MZ, managementZones) OR $MZ == "Any") AND (in($Tag, tags) OR $Tag == "Any") AND in("Technologies", $Coverage)
| expand softwareTechnologies
| parse softwareTechnologies, "'type:' LD:Technology ',edition:' LD:Edition ',version:' LD:Version"
| filter Technology != "DYNATRACE" AND in(Technology, $Technologies)
| fieldsAdd key = concat(Technology, ":", Edition, ":", Version)
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter dt.system.bucket == "default_davis_custom_events"
  | filter event.name == "software-obsolescence-management.technology-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC
  ],
  sourceField:key,
  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| fieldsAdd `Extended Support` = if(
  ((indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), key, from: 0) >= 0) AND (indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), "}", from: indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), key, from: 0)) >= 0)),
  substring(
      toString(array($SupportOverrides)),
      from: (
        (indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), key, from: 0) +
        stringLength(key) +
        5)
      ),
      to: (indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), "}", from: indexOf(toString(array($SupportOverrides)), key, from: 0)) - 2)
    ),
    else: null
)
| fieldsAdd age = now() - toTimestamp(event.currentCyclePublishedAt)
| fieldsAdd timeBeforeObsolescence = toTimestamp(if(isNotNull(`Extended Support`), `Extended Support`, else: event.eol)) - now()
| fieldsAdd Status = if(timeBeforeObsolescence < toDuration(0), "üü† Obsolete")
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND event.currentVersion == event.latestVersion, "üü¢ Up-to-date", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND (isNotNull(timeBeforeObsolescence) OR (event.currentVersion != event.latestVersion AND isNotNull(event.currentVersion) AND event.currentVersion != "null" AND isNotNull(event.latestVersion))), "üü° Updatable", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status), "‚ö™ Undocumented", else: Status)
| filter in(Status, "üü† Obsolete")
| summarize count = count()
| fields concat(count, "üü†")

152.title: Library Version Distribution
152.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from: -15m
| expand softwareComponentId = asRecord(contains)[`dt.entity.software_component`] // This relationship retrieves a maximum 100 entities
| dedup softwareComponentId
| lookup [
  fetch dt.entity.software_component, from: -15m
  | fields entity.name, id, softwareComponentType, softwareComponentVersion, belongs_to
],
  sourceField:softwareComponentId,
  lookupField:id,
  executionOrder: leftFirst
| fieldsAdd lastColonIndex = lastIndexOf(lookup.entity.name, ":"), softwareObsolescenceManagement = lookup.entity.name
| fieldsAdd Technology = lookup.softwareComponentType
| fieldsAdd Library = substring(lookup.entity.name, to:lastColonIndex)
| fieldsAdd Version = lookup.softwareComponentVersion
| filter in("Libraries", $Coverage) AND in(lookup.softwareComponentType, $Technologies) AND (in(Library, $Libraries) OR in("Any (more scalable than *)", $Libraries))
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
      fetch events, from: -7d
      | filter dt.system.bucket == "default_davis_custom_events"
      | filter event.name == "software-obsolescence-management.library-info"
      | fields timestamp, key, currentVersionPublishedAt, currentVersion, latestStableVersion, latestStableVersionPublishedAt, licenses, link
      | sort timestamp DESC
      | limit 100000
    ],
    sourceField:lookup.entity.name,
    lookupField:key)
| fieldsAdd `Top Vulnerability` = lookup([
      fetch events, from: -15m
      | filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
      | filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
      | filter event.level=="VULNERABILITY"
      | expand softwareComponentId = affected_entities.vulnerable_components.ids
      | fields softwareComponentId, vulnerability.davis_assessment.score
      | sort vulnerability.davis_assessment.score DESC
      | dedup softwareComponentId
      | limit 100000
    ],
    sourceField:softwareComponentId,
    lookupField:softwareComponentId)
| fieldsAdd `Vulnerability Score` = `Top Vulnerability`[vulnerability.davis_assessment.score]
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| fieldsAdd age = now() - toTimestamp(event.currentVersionPublishedAt)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNotNull(`Top Vulnerability`), "üî¥ Vulnerable")
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(event.currentVersion) AND isNotNull(event.latestStableVersion) AND event.currentVersion == event.latestStableVersion, "üü¢ Up-to-date", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(event.currentVersion) AND isNotNull(event.latestStableVersion), "üü° Updatable", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status), "‚ö™ Undocumented", else: Status)
| filter in(Status, $Status)
| expand id = lookup.belongs_to[dt.entity.process_group_instance] // This relationship retrieves a maximum 100 entities
| fieldsAdd pg = if($MZ == "Any" AND $Tag == "Any", null, else: lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from: -15m
      | fields id, managementZones, tags
      | filter ($MZ == "Any" OR in($MZ, managementZones)) AND ($Tag == "Any" OR in($Tag, tags))
      | limit 100000
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
    )
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pgi."
| filter ($MZ == "Any" OR in($MZ, pgi.managementZones)) AND ($Tag == "Any" OR in($Tag, pgi.tags))
| summarize by:{Status, Technology, Library, Version}, count = count()
| fields Status, `Process Count` = count, Technology, Library, Version
| sort Status ASC, `Process Count` DESC

168.title: Scanned bytes per component of the Software Obsolescence Management solution
168.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter contains(query_string, "softwareObsolescenceManagement") AND scanned_bytes != 0
| fields timestamp, component = if(client.application_context == "dynatrace.dashboards", "Dashboard", else: "Workflow"), scanned_bytes
| makeTimeseries `Scanned bytes` = sum(scanned_bytes), by:{component}, interval: 1h

169.title: Total scanned bytes by the Software Obsolescence Management solution
169.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter contains(query_string, "softwareObsolescenceManagement")
| fields timestamp, component = if(client.application_context == "dynatrace.dashboards", "Dashboard", else: "Workflow"), scanned_bytes
| summarize sum(scanned_bytes)

170.title: DQL queries per component of the Software Obsolescence Management solution
